title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7026.3 - Limitation and deprivation of incoming printed material and publications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7026.3 - Limitation and deprivation of incoming printed material and publications

State Regulations
(a) The
chief administrative officer shall adopt rules and regulations which may limit
the amount of printed material and other paper materials retained within a
prisoner's living area, in furtherance of the safety, security and good order
of the facility, especially safety from the risk of fire. (b) Besides the limitations allowed by
subdivision (a) of this section, any decision to deny, restrict or limit an
inmate of any right, service, item or article, guaranteed an inmate by the
provisions of this Part, shall be done in accordance with section
7075.5
of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

7026.3

New

York State Register June 5, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 22, eff. 6/5/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
